description: If you try to run an instance using the image name instead of the id, it returns an unhelpful NotFound error.  This is due to a typo in s3.py
title: Running an instance using an image name returns NotFound

comments.content: If you try to run an instance using the image name instead of the id, it returns an unhelpful NotFound error.  This is due to a typo in s3.py
